ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Contact_Related', IF( TimeTrade_SF1__Contact__c =null, True, False) , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Lead_Related',IF( TimeTrade_SF1__Lead__c =null, True, False),False))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a Lead/Contact in the Customer Attendee
